remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別物件的欄位中提供容器。This class object provides the container for the fields of an . 存取屬性擷取物件。Accessing the property of an retrieves an object. 屬性和方法類別是的超集介面。The properties and methods of the class are a superset of the interface. 所有屬性和方法的介面，包括它繼承自 ASP.NET介面，請在這裡可以適用。All properties and methods of that interface, including those that it inherits from the ASP.NET interface, are applicable here. 這個類別會提供額外的屬性和方法來修改該集合。This class provides additional properties and methods to modify the collection. 這些屬性和方法提供標準的集合的管理功能，例如加入、 移除，以及清除集合。These properties and methods provide standard collection management capability, such as adding, removing, and clearing the collection. 如果您呼叫的方法來變更集合， ， ，或在 Page_Init，檢視狀態的期間， ，和物件清單的屬性會被忽略.If you change the collection by calling the methods , , , or during Page_Init, the view state for the , , and properties of the object list is ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不適用於唯讀介面。This method is not available in the read-only interface. 您可以使用套用這個方法的所有類別的方法。You can use the method for all the classes where this method applies. 例如，方法集合清除所有的樣式，在集合中，或，它會清除集合中的所有選項。For example, the method for a collection clears all the styles in the collection; or for the , it clears all the choices in the collection. 將欄位加入至控制項的物件清單的變更資料繫結行為的欄位，會要求您一次將資料繫結至控制項。Adding a field to the fields of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control, and requires you to bind data to the control again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在這個方法的第二個版本，它會搜尋具有欄位屬性`fieldId`並傳回第一個比對欄位。In the second version of this method, it searches for a field with the property `fieldId` and returns the first matching field. 如果沒有找到符合的它會搜尋具有欄位屬性的`fieldID`參數並傳回第一個比對欄位。If no match is found, it searches for a field with the property's `fieldID` parameter and returns the first matching field. 否則，它會傳回-1。Otherwise, it returns -1.
